scripts.plugin:build: docker exec -t payload-visual-editor-node-1 /bin/sh -c 'mkdir -p dist && cp src/styles.scss dist/styles.scss && yarn tsc'
scripts.plugin:build-watch: docker exec -t payload-visual-editor-node-1 /bin/sh -c 'mkdir -p dist && src/styles.scss dist/styles.scss && yarn tsc -w'
scripts.example:cms:dev: docker exec -t payload-visual-editor-node-1 /bin/sh -c 'cd example/cms && yarn dev'
scripts.example:cms:generate-types: docker exec -t payload-visual-editor-node-1 /bin/sh -c 'cd example/cms && yarn generate:types'
scripts.example:website:dev: docker exec -t payload-visual-editor-node-1 /bin/sh -c 'cd example/website && yarn dev'
